meanings.definition: Resembling a tub in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The tublike flower pot was perfect for the small plant.
meanings.sent2: The tublike container held all the toys neatly.
meanings.sent3: The tublike bathtub made the bathroom look like a spa.
meanings.sent4: The tublike clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tublike boat bobbed gently on the calm lake.

meanings.definition: Having the form or characteristics of a tub.
meanings.sent1: The tublike structure was used for soaking grains.
meanings.sent2: The tublike vehicle could transport large items easily.
meanings.sent3: The tublike chair was surprisingly comfortable.
meanings.sent4: The tublike tunnel led deep into the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The tublike pool was perfect for relaxing on hot days.
